GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug_on in ext4_writepages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 1b061af037646c9cdb0afd8a8d2f1e1c06285866. For more details please see the references link.
